text: Miracles from Heaven is a 2016 American Christian drama movie. It was directed by Patricia Riggen. The movie was written by Randy Brown. It is based on Miracles from Heaven by Christy Beam, The movie tells the true story of her young daughter who had a near-death experience. Her daughter was later cured of an incurable disease. The movie stars Jennifer Garner, Kylie Rogers, Martin Henderson, John Carroll Lynch, Eugenio Derbez and Queen Latifah. Principal photography began in Atlanta, Georgia, in July 2015. The movie was released on March 16, 2016. It was financially successful, The movie became the 8th highest-grossing Christian movie in the United States. The critics did not all like the movie but most said that Garner's performance was very good. == Cast == * Kylie Rogers as Anna Beam * Jennifer Garner as Christy Beam, Anna's mother * Martin Henderson as Dr. Kevin Beam * Eugenio Derbez as Dr. Nurko * Queen Latifah as Angela, a waitress who befriends Anna and her mother in a restaurant in Boston * Brighton Sharbino as Abbie Beam, Anna's older sister. * Courtney Fansler as Adelynn Beam, Anna's younger sister * John Carroll Lynch as Reverend Scott, the senior pastor of the Beam family's church * Bruce Altman as Dr. Burgi, Anna's doctor and the head of the pediatric division at the hospital in Texas ==References== Category:2016 drama movies Category:Christian media
title: Miracles from Heaven (movie)
